name: Terms of Living
description:
So you just lost your job, where do you go from here?

Terms of Living is a short interactive fic about a bank that exchanges your remaining years for money, and a discussion about some of the consequences that follow. Inspired by the manga, Three Days of Happiness by Miaki Sugaru, this was written for my final assignment in my Writing for Games I class. The constraint was the Telltale Games test: writers had to create a story involving a visit to a bank, include at least 5 interactive choices, and take no more than approx. 7 mins to complete a playthrough of a path. 

It's not as poignant as I hoped, but it's a small story with a lesson about hope. There are two endings to obtain depending on your choices. It has been roughly proofread and playtested, though occasional typos may be present. 

This was previously titled Life's Worth. I debated on a number of titles but decided to settle with a twist on the phrase terms of service; another title I considered was the phrase cost of living. 

Dev time: approximately 15 hours
